roleset.name: be composed of pieces
roleset.note: CONSIST-V NOTES: Based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'exist'. (from consist.01-v)

example.name: prepositional
example.text: [The second part]-1, *trace*-1 consisting of $100 million of senior subordinated floating-rate notes, was priced at 99 3/4 to float 4.25% above the three-month London interbank offered rate.
example.arg: of $100 million of senior subordinated floating-rate notes

example.name: verbal
example.text: The collateral consists of collateralized whole loans with a weighted average coupon rate of 11.08% and weighted average remaining term to maturity of 28 years.
example.arg: of collateralized whole loans with a weighted average coupon rate of 11.08% and weighted average remaining term to maturity of 28 years
